card.text: First strike Cohort - {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Zada's Commando deals 1 damage to target opponent.

card.name: Zendikar Resurgent
card.text: Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced. Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

card.name: Zulaport Chainmage
card.text: Cohort - {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Target opponent loses 2 life.
